Name: Jupiter
Introduction: Jupiter is the largest planet in the solar system and a gas giant. It is known for its vibrant bands of clouds and a massive storm called the Great Red Spot. Jupiter has a strong magnetic field and a large number of moons, with the four largest ones known as the Galilean moons: Io, Europa, Ganymede, and Callisto. Its composition primarily consists of hydrogen and helium, similar to the Sun.
